amendment.description: To authorize a comprehensive program of support for victims of torture, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1152 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1152 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Coleman to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9162-9166; text: CR S9163) To authorize a comprehensive program of support for victims of torture, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1152 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Coleman to Amendment SA 1136.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1152 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
